alert.note: Alert for Lee (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 07 at 11:29AM EDT until May 08 at 9:00PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Kentucky... Kentucky River at Heidelberg affecting Lee County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Kentucky River at Heidelberg. * WHEN...Until late tomorrow evening. * IMPACTS...At 20.0 feet, Low lying areas flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:45 AM EDT Saturday the stage was 20.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is rising above flood stage at this time and will continue rising to a crest of around 20.9 feet this evening. The river will then recede and should fall below flood stage by Sunday afternoon. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 20.9 feet on 03/16/1922. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. The next statement will be issued 11 PM tonight.
